resources.string: Khusela uhambo lwakho, ungaloyiki nanini na
Ukuba ungumsebenzisi omtsha, khetha Bhalisa ukwenza iakhawunti. Abasebenzisi abakhoyo banokufaka iinkcukacha zabo apha.
Khetha Qhubeka ungaziwa ukuze ukhangele izixhobo ngaphandle kokwenza iakhawunti. Umsebenzi ongaziwayo AKUTHENDELEKWANGA okanye ulandelwe.
Ukufikelela kwakho kunye neempawu (Iingxelo, Ukucebisa, Izixhobo zoMlawuli) kuxhomekeke kwindima yeakhawunti yakho (Umsebenzisi, Umcebisi, okanye Umlawuli).
Ideshibhodi engundoqo ibandakanya imisebenzi ebalulekileyo efana neqhosha le-SOS kunye nokukwazi ukwenza ingxelo eneenkcukacha.
Cofa iqhosha lolwimi (umz. EN, AF, XH) kwikona ephezulu ukuze utshintshe ngokukhawuleza ulwimi lwe-app.
